name: Amit Bhalla
title: Marketing Strategist & Growth Catalyst
heroTitle:
Your Marketing Isn't Working.
I'll Fix That.
heroDescription: You've tried everything—paid ads, content marketing, social media—but your CAC keeps rising while conversion rates plateau. I help B2B companies transform their marketing from a cost center to a revenue-generating machine.
about: As a marketing leader with nearly two decades in B2B SaaS, I fuse brand storytelling, market research, and performance marketing to fuel enterprise growth. My track record spans elevating brand equity (35% recall), increasing pipeline velocity (20-30% YoY), and reducing CAC by up to 50% through disciplined GTM strategies and customer experience optimization. By embedding operational rigor and a data-driven culture, I also bolster employer branding and retention (15-20% gains) across global organizations.

experience.description: Part of the CEO's office, leading the Marketing and Strategy functions. Rebuilding the digital identity for the brand and helping LOBs build their growth roadmaps for the next 3 years.
Head of Employer Brand for BCG in Asia Pacific. Led a team of 10 marketers working with 100+ recruiters in 12 countries to deliver on BCG's talent strategy & DEI agenda via digital & social channels.
Created the marketing and employer branding strategy for 12 countries. Introduced talent attraction and employer branding to BCG's Asia Pacific recruiting function.
Developed and executed product marketing strategies for BCG B2B solutions, contributing to an increase in product adoption and revenue growth.

education.degree: International Certificate Program in Product Management & Marketing (ICPM)
